title: A Portrait of Trinidad
creator_credit: County Films Ltd, Victor M. Gover and W. A. Lee
brief_description: Trinidad on the threshold of independence. Among her thriving industries shows oil, asphalt, ad cigarettes in production. Progress in agriculture, transport, and communications, health and education, are also described. Carnival scenes capture the charm and gaiety of the Caribbean island.
